actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post the interest rates charged for each consumer loan category in clear and conspicuous language and in an easily visible location on the business premises.

titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.
